00032 inline double DDynamicProgramming::checkBandCost(int i,int j,int numRows,
00033              int numCols, int bandRadius,
00034              double bandCost){
00035   double iExpect, jExpect;
00036 
00037   iExpect = numRows * j / (double)numCols;
00038   if(i > (iExpect + bandRadius))
00039     return bandCost;
00040   jExpect = ((numRows-1)+numCols * i) /  (double)numRows;
00041   if(j > (jExpect + bandRadius))
00042     return bandCost;
00043   return 0.;
00044 }
